tldr_points: AI translation tools reduce technical manual translation costs by 40-60% while eliminating language barriers for global customers
Modern AI combines machine learning, statistical methods, and neural networks to accurately translate complex technical jargon and terminology
Hybrid AI-human translation systems overcome AI limitations like cultural context and idiomatic expressions for superior accuracy
Companies like Siemens, Microsoft, and Amazon successfully use AI translation tools to localize content across 100+ languages
